data.title: Advances in Neural Networks – ISNN 2019: 16th International Symposium on Neural Networks, ISNN 2019, Moscow, Russia, July 10–12, 2019, Proceedings, Part I [1st ed.] 978
data.meta_description: This two-volume set LNCS 11554 and 11555 constitutes the refereed proceedings of the 16th International Symposium on Neu...
